name: Insolent Fool!! Stand Down!!
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Kuja Pirates
effect: [Main] You may rest 4 of your DON!! cards: If your Leader is [Boa Hancock], play up to 1 {Amazon Lily} or {Kuja Pirates} type Character card with a cost of 6 or less from your hand. [Counter] Up to 1 of your [Boa Hancock] cards gains +3000 power during this battle.
